thread.title: RAIL STRIKE: Will your journey be affected? | West Country (E)
thread.title_full: RAIL STRIKE: Will your journey be affected? | West Country (E) - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: RAIL STRIKE: Will your journey be affected? | West Country (E)
text:
Are your Bank Holiday travel plans on track? Credit: PA Members of the RMT Union are due to walk out just after midnight on Friday night for three days after talks with First Great Western failed.
It is one of the busiest weekends of the year as people make a last trip before school starts.
You can check with First Great Western here to see if your journey will be affected?
Last updated Sat 29 Aug 2015 Read more 20 updates 3 day First Great Western strike to go ahead after talks stall Travel First Great Western Dorset Bristol Wiltshire Gloucestershire Somerset
